title: Don Lemon taken into custody for his involvement in livestreaming protest at Minnesota church
description: Former CNN host Don Lemon was taken into custody for his role in the left-wing protest that took over a Minnesota church, his attorney said in a statement.

title: Alex Pretti should have faced charges for spitting on agent before fatal shooting: former prosecutor
description: Video shows Alex Pretti allegedly spitting at agents before Border Patrol shooting in Minneapolis. Former prosecutor explains why no charges filed.

title: Pete Buttigieg, other Democrats endorse Amy Klobuchar for Minnesota governor
description: Biden-era Transportation Secretary Pete Buttigieg and other Democratic figures have endorsed gubernatorial candidate Sen. Amy Klobuchar for governor of Minnesota.

title: The Tech Arsenal That ICE Has Deployed in Minneapolis
description: Agents use facial recognition, social media monitoring and other tech tools not only to identify undocumented immigrants but also to track protesters, current and former officials said.

title: Trump Repeats Claims Against Alex Pretti, Casting Slain Nurse as ‘Agitator’
description: After videos resurfaced showing a confrontation between Mr. Pretti and federal agents 11 days before officers fatally shot him, President Trump again sought to cast blame on him.

title: In Minnesota, America’s Federal System Is Coming Apart
description: The state is in a standoff with the federal government over who has the power to investigate the killing of protesters. It’s not a fair fight.

title: Homan says some agents in Minnesota may be withdrawn, but demands access to jails and prisons
description: Border czar Tom Homan said some of the 3,000 federal agents currently deployed to Minnesota could be withdrawn if state leaders allow federal authorities expanded access to undocumented immigrants being held in state prisons and county jails. Lilia Luciano reports.

title: Journalist Don Lemon arrested after protest at Minnesota church
description: Don Lemon was taken into custody by federal agents in Los Angeles, where had been covering the Grammy Awards, his attorney said.

title: Activists call for "National Shutdown" strikes as Noem speaks out on Pretti shooting comments
description: Activists around the U.S. are calling for a national strike on Feb. 30 against the Trump administration's ICE operations. This comes as Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem speaks out on her comments regarding the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti. CBS News' Jarred Hill reports.

title: Border czar Homan speaks in Minnesota: "I'm staying till the problem's gone"
description: Border czar Tom Homan gave his first news conference Thursday morning since arriving in Minnesota at the request of President Trump.

title: Federal judge bars Trump administration from detaining lawful refugees in Minnesota
description: On Wednesday, a federal judge filed a temporary restraining order preventing the Trump administration from detaining lawfully resettled refugees in Minnesota.

title: Report: Democrat Lawmakers Advised to Stay Out of Minnesota amid Security Concerns
description: House Democrat leadership staff recommended officials not to travel to Minnesota this week, citing security concerns amid a heightened threat environment and recent attacks on lawmakers, as well as to avoid burdening local resources during ongoing anti-ICE demonstrations. The post Report: Democrat Lawmakers Advised to Stay Out of Minnesota amid Security Concerns appeared first on Breitbart .

title: Minnesota Man Impersonates FBI Agent in Failed Jailbreak of Alleged Assassin Luigi Mangione
description: A Minnesota man allegedly impersonated an FBI agent in a failed jailbreak of accused assassin Luigi Mangione this week. The post Minnesota Man Impersonates FBI Agent in Failed Jailbreak of Alleged Assassin Luigi Mangione appeared first on Breitbart .

title: Kevin McCarthy: Homan 'De-Escalated' Minneapolis, Calmer Heads Can Prevail

title: Gun Owners Of America: Our Defense of Exercising 1st/2nd Amendments Together Not Specific to Alex Pretti

title: Video Shows Alex Pretti Yelling 'F**king Assault Me,' Taunting Federal Law Enforcement

title: Disinformation Agent: Sen. Dick Durbin Brings AI-Generated Image of Alex Pretti Shooting to Senate Floor
description: Sen. Dick Durbin (D-IL) displayed a blowup poster of an AI-generated image falsely depicting the fatal shooting of Alex Pretti — in which one AI-created federal agent is clearly missing a head — while delivering remarks on the Senate floor. title: Murderers, Rapists, Pedophiles: DHS Details Continuing Arrests of Criminal Illegal Aliens in Minnesota
description: Department of Homeland Security (DHS) officials released new details on arrests made one day this week during the continuing Operation Metro Surge. The DHS report identifies multiple criminal illegal aliens taken into custody on Tuesday in Minnesota for crimes ranging from homicide and rape to child abuse and domestic violence. The agency said sanctuary jurisdictions continue to obstruct efforts to remove dangerous offenders. title: Homan at the helm in Minnesota, Maxwell: 25 Epstein accomplices inked ‘secret settlements’
description: Border Czar Tom Homan reported progress in Minnesota after meeting with local leaders and took time to jab at his predecessor, his boss, Kristi Noem and the team that oversaw the chaos. Ghislaine Maxwell’s latest attempt at freedom includes a claim that 25 of Jeffrey Epstein’s co-conspirators got secret sweetheart settlements. She keeps trying, will...

title: Ex-CNN host Don Lemon arrested for Minnesota church invasion
description: Disgraced ex-CNN anchor Don Lemon was arrested late Thursday, weeks after he joined anti-ICE protesters as they interrupted a Sunday service while storming a Minneapolis church.

title: Hispanic Republicans breathe sigh of relief over Trump immigration crackdown course correction in Minnesota
description: Hispanic voters view immigration as a process that must be “legal, organized and responsible,” Florez asserted, “and none of those three things happened during the Biden years.”

title: Handling of Pretti investigation has some prosecutors on verge of quitting
description: Federal prosecutors in Minneapolis, deeply frustrated by the response to the shootings of Renée Good and Alex Pretti, have suggested they could resign en masse.

title: Sen. Klobuchar announces bid for Minnesota governor, seeks ‘common ground’
description: Klobuchar is likely to jump into a race that was upended after Gov. Tim Walz (D) made a surprise announcement this month that he would drop his reelection bid.

title: Trump faces fresh MAGA blowback for efforts to ‘de-escalate’ in Minnesota
description: The president’s response to widespread public dismay over the shooting death of another Minnesotan has put him in a bind with his own base.

title: VA leaders have barely acknowledged Alex Pretti’s death, workers say
description: Employees at the Minneapolis VA hospital were initially told they could not hold a memorial for Pretti, though that decision was later reversed.

title: Don Lemon arrested by federal authorities in connection with Minnesota church protest
description: Former CNN anchor Don Lemon was arrested by federal authorities on Thursday night in connection with a protest at a Minnesota church service earlier this month.

title: In fatal Minneapolis shootings, viral video plays the central role
description: In the snow-covered streets of Minneapolis, smartphones are recording the first draft of modern American history

title: Border czar talks possible drawdown in Minneapolis
description: Border czar talks possible drawdown in Minneapolis

title: Former CNN journalist arrested in connection with Minnesota protest
description: Journalist Don Lemon has been arrested in connection with an incident several weeks ago in which anti-ICE protesters disrupted a service at a Minnesota church.

title: WATCH:  Minneapolis mayor: ‘We are on the frontlines of a very important battle’
description: Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey addressed the federal immigration crackdown in Minnesota during remarks at the U.S. Conference of Mayors in Washington, D.C.

title: WATCH:  DHS sends initial report on Alex Pretti killing to Congress
description: New details have emerged in the killing of Alex Pretti by federal agents in Minneapolis. ABC News' Matt Rivers reports.

title: Homan plans to pull agents from Minnesota. And, Senate strikes short-term funding deal
description: Border czar Tom Homan has suggested possibly pulling some federal immigration agents out of Minnesota. And, Senate leaders struck a short-term funding deal to keep most of the government running.
